i. Approvals obtained by the Company for the premises situated at DSIIC's Industrial built-up property bearing no. 2, Pocket-H, Sector-5, Bawana Industrial Area, Bawana, Delhi- 110028.
1. The Company has obtained the following licenses under the Medical Devices Rules, 2017:
